Tutorial.Halide.Env_register
=====================

Optimizing Image Pipelines environment uses a :class:`HalideEnv
<third_party.compiler_gym.envs.optimization.HalideEnv>` to register a Halide policy search base environment.
Policy search module uses A :class:`BanditHalideEnv <third_party.compiler_gym.envs.optimization.BanditHalideEnv>` to register a Halide base environment.

.. contents:: Halide Environment Classes:
  :local:

.. currentmodule:: compiler_gym.envs.optimization

HalideEnv
-------
.. autoclass:: HalideEnv
  :members:

BanditHalideEnv
-------
.. autoclass:: BanditHalideEnv
  :members:
